thread.title: Trump says wants "reciprocal" trade with Europe

title: Trump says wants "reciprocal" trade with Europe
text:
Trump says wants "reciprocal" trade with Europe Friday, April 27, 2018 - 01:39
Despite tensions over trade, President Trump said Friday that German Chancellor Angela Merkel was doing a ''fantastic job'', but added he wants to have a ''reciprocal'' trade relationship with Germany. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Despite tensions over trade, President Trump said Friday that German Chancellor Angela Merkel was doing a "fantastic job", but added he wants to have a "reciprocal" trade relationship with Germany.
